Producer: Darren Moorman, Jake McEntire, Ken Carpenter
Screenwriter: Jake McEntire, Jason Baumgardner, Chris Dowling
Synopsis: All-star athlete Zach Truett finds glory on the high school football field -- working to earn a college scholarship and a ticket out of town. When a devastating knee injury forces Zach to the sidelines, his brother laces up his cleats to compete in track and field. Despite the setback, there seems to be one silver lining for Zach -- he soon develops a budding relationship with a young nurse who works at the hospital.
Title: Run the Race
